00276 // Read a node page to initialize this node from the disk
00277 template<typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType,
00278                 typename Alloc> bool sdb_node_< KeyType, ValueType, LockType, Alloc>::read(
00279                 FILE* f) {
00280 
00281         //#ifdef DEBUG
00282         //      static int _rcount;
00283         //      cout<<"reading "<<_rcount++<<endl;
00284         //#endif
00285 
00286         if (!f) {
00287                 return false;
00288         }
00289 
00290         //cout<<"read from fpos "<<fpos<<endl;
00291 
00292         // get to the right location
00293         if (0 != fseek(f, fpos, SEEK_SET)) {
00294                 return false;
00295         }
00296 
00297         keys.resize(_maxKeys);
00298         values.resize(_maxKeys);
00299         children.resize(_maxKeys+1);
00300 
00301         char *pBuf = new char[_pageSize];
00302         if (1 != fread(pBuf, _pageSize, 1, f)) {
00303                 return false;
00304         }
00305 
00306         char *p = pBuf;
00307 
00308         // read the leaf flag and the object count
00309         byte leafFlag = 0;
00310         memcpy(&leafFlag, p, sizeof(byte));
00311         p += sizeof(byte);
00312         memcpy(&objCount, p, sizeof(size_t));
00313         p += sizeof(size_t);
00314         isLeaf = (leafFlag == 1);
00315 
00316         //cout<<"read leafFlag ="<<isLeaf<<endl;
00317         //cout<<" read objCount="<<objCount<<endl;
00318 
00319         // read the addresses of the child pages
00320         if (objCount> 0 && !isLeaf) {
00321                 long* childAddresses = new long[objCount + 1];
00322                 //memset(childAddresses, 0xff, sizeof(long) * (objCount + 1));                  
00323                 memcpy(childAddresses, p, sizeof(long)*(objCount+1));
00324                 p += sizeof(long)*(objCount+1);
00325 
00326                 //Only allocate childnode when the node is no a leaf node.
00327                 if ( !isLeaf) {
00328                         for (size_t i = 0; i <= objCount; i++) {
00329                                 if (children[i] == 0) {
00330                                         children[i] = new sdb_node_;
00331                                 }
00332                                 children[i]->fpos = childAddresses[i];
00333                                 children[i]->childNo = i;
00334                                 //cout<<children[i]->fpos<<endl;
00335                         }
00336                 }
00337                 delete[] childAddresses;
00338                 childAddresses = 0;
00339         }
00340 
00341         memcpy(&_overflowAddress, p, sizeof(long));
00342         p += sizeof(long);
00343         memcpy(&_overflowPageCount, p, sizeof(size_t));
00344         p += sizeof(size_t);
00345 
00346         char *povfl=0;
00347         size_t np = 0;
00348 
00349         //cout<<" read overFlowAddress="<<_overflowAddress<<endl;
00350 
00351         //read the key/vaue pairs
00352         for (size_t i = 0; i < objCount; i++) {
00353                 //cout<<" read data idx="<<i<<endl;
00354                 size_t ksize, vsize;
00355                 
00356                 //DbObjPtr ptr, ptr1;   
00357 
00358                 memcpy(&ksize, p, sizeof(size_t));
00359 
00360                 //cout<<"ksize"<<ksize<<endl;   
00361 
00362                 //read from overflow page
00363                 if (ksize == 0) {
00364                         if ( !povfl) {
00365                                 //cout<<"read overflowaddress="<<_overflowAddress<<" | "<<_overflowPageCount<<endl;
00366 
00367                                 povfl = new char[_pageSize*_overflowPageCount];
00368                                 if (0 != fseek(f, _overflowAddress, SEEK_SET)) {
00369                                         return false;
00370                                 }
00371                                 if (1 != fread(povfl, _pageSize*_overflowPageCount, 1, f)) {
00372                                         return false;
00373                                 }
00374                         }
00375                         p = povfl + np*_pageSize;
00376                         ++np;
00377                         memcpy(&ksize, p, sizeof(size_t));
00378                         assert(ksize != 0);
00379                 }
00380                 p += sizeof(size_t);    
00381                 
00382                 //byte* kBuf = new byte[ksize];
00383                 //memcpy(kBuf, p, ksize);               
00384                 
00385                 //ptr.reset(new DbObj(kBuf, ksize));
00386                 //read_image(keys[i], ptr);
00387                 izene_deserialization<KeyType> izd(p, ksize);
00388                 izd.read_image( keys[i] );
00389                 
00390                 //delete[] kBuf;
00391                 //kBuf = 0;
00392                 
00393                 p += ksize;
00394 
00395                 memcpy(&vsize, p, sizeof(size_t));
00396                 p += sizeof(size_t);
00397 
00398                 //if value is of NULLType, the vsize is 0
00399                 if (vsize != 0) {
00400                         //byte* vBuf = new byte[vsize];
00401                         //memcpy(vBuf, p, vsize);
00402                 
00403                         //ptr1.reset(new DbObj(vBuf, vsize));
00404                         //read_image(values[i], ptr1);
00405                         
00406                         izene_deserialization<ValueType> izd1(p, vsize);
00407                         izd1.read_image( values[i] );
00408                         
00409                         p += vsize;             
00410                         
00411                         //delete[] vBuf;
00412                         //vBuf = 0;
00413                 }
00414         }
00415 
00416         if (povfl) {
00417                 delete [] povfl;
00418                 povfl = 0;
00419         }
00420         delete [] pBuf;
00421         pBuf = 0;
00422         isLoaded = true;
00423         isDirty = false;
00424 
00425         //increment avtiveNodeNum 
00426         sdb_node_::activeNodeNum++;
00427         return true;
00428 }
00429 
00430 template<typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType,
00431                 typename Alloc> bool sdb_node_< KeyType, ValueType, LockType, Alloc>::write(
00432                 FILE* f) {
00433 
00434         //#ifdef DEBUG
00435         //static int _wcount;
00436         //cout<<"write "<<_wcount++ <<endl;
00437         //#endif
00438 
00439         // If it is not loaded, it measn that we haven't been changed it ,
00440         // so we can say that the flush was successful.
00441         if (!isDirty) {
00442                 return true;
00443         }
00444         if (!isLoaded) {
00445                 return true;
00446         }
00447         if (!f) {
00448                 return false;
00449         }
00450 
00451         size_t tsz=0;
00452 
00453         //cout<<"_pageSize"<<_pageSize<<endl;
00454         char* pBuf = new char[_pageSize];
00455         memset(pBuf, 0, _pageSize);
00456         char* p = pBuf;
00457 
00458         //cout<<"write fpos="<<fpos<<endl;
00459         // get to the right location
00460         if (0 != fseek(f, fpos, SEEK_SET)) {
00461                 //assert(false);
00462                 return false;
00463         }
00464 
00465         // write the leaf flag and the object count
00466         byte leafFlag = isLeaf ? 1 : 0;
00467 
00468         memcpy(p, &leafFlag, sizeof(byte));
00469         p += sizeof(byte);
00470         tsz += sizeof(byte);
00471 
00472         //cout<<"write objCount= "<<objCount<<endl;
00473         memcpy(p, &objCount, sizeof(size_t));
00474         p += sizeof(size_t);
00475         tsz += sizeof(size_t);
00476 
00477         // write the addresses of the child pages
00478         if (objCount> 0 && !isLeaf) {
00479                 long* childAddresses = new long[objCount + 1];
00480                 tsz += (objCount+1)*sizeof(long);
00481                 assert(tsz < _pageSize);
00482                 for (size_t i=0; i<=objCount; i++) {
00483                         childAddresses[i] = children[i]->fpos;
00484                         //cout<<"write child fpos="<<childAddresses[i]<<endl;                   
00485                 }
00486                 memcpy(p, childAddresses, sizeof(long)*(objCount+1));
00487                 p += (objCount+1)*sizeof(long);
00488                 delete [] childAddresses;
00489                 childAddresses = 0;
00490 
00491         }
00492 
00493         size_t ovfloff = tsz;
00494         memcpy(p, &_overflowAddress, sizeof(long));
00495         p += sizeof(long);
00496         tsz += sizeof(long);
00497         memcpy(p, &_overflowPageCount, sizeof(size_t));
00498         p += sizeof(size_t);
00499         tsz += sizeof(size_t);
00500 
00501         assert(tsz+sizeof(size_t) <= _pageSize);
00502         size_t np =1;
00503 
00504         for (size_t i=0; i<objCount; i++) {
00505                 //cout<<"write key ="<<keys[i]<<endl;
00506                 /*DbObjPtr ptr, ptr1;
00507                 ptr.reset(new DbObj);
00508                 ptr1.reset(new DbObj);
00509                 write_image(keys[i], ptr);
00510                 write_image(values[i], ptr1);
00511                 size_t ksize = ptr->getSize();
00512                 size_t vsize = ptr1->getSize();*/
00513                 
00514                 char *ptr, *ptr1;
00515                 size_t ksize, vsize;
00516                 izene_serialization<KeyType> izs( keys[i] );
00517                 izene_serialization<ValueType> izs1( values[i] );
00518                 izs.write_image(ptr, ksize);
00519                 izs1.write_image(ptr1, vsize);
00520                 
00521                 
00522                 
00523                 size_t esize = 2*sizeof(size_t)+ksize+vsize;
00524 
00525                 //when overflowing occurs, append the overflow buf
00526                 if (tsz+esize+sizeof(size_t) > _pageSize) {
00527                         size_t endflag = 0;
00528                         memcpy(p, &endflag, sizeof(size_t));
00529                         char *temp = new char[(np+1)*_pageSize];
00530                         memcpy(temp, pBuf, np*_pageSize);
00531                         delete pBuf;
00532                         pBuf = temp;
00533                         p = pBuf+np*_pageSize;
00534                         tsz = 0;
00535                         ++np;
00536                 }
00537                 memcpy(p, &ksize, sizeof(size_t));
00538                 p += sizeof(size_t);
00539                 memcpy(p, ptr, ksize);
00540                 p += ksize;
00541                 memcpy(p, &vsize, sizeof(size_t));
00542                 p += sizeof(size_t);
00543                 memcpy(p, ptr1, vsize);
00544                 p += vsize;
00545 
00546                 tsz += esize;
00547         }
00548 
00549         //cout<<"tsz="<<tsz<<endl;
00550         //no overflow
00551         if (np <= 1) {
00552                 if (1 != fwrite(pBuf, _pageSize, 1, f) ) {
00553                         return false;
00554                 }
00555         } else {
00556                 //oveflow               
00557                 //cout<<"writing overflow!!!!"<<endl;
00558                 if (_overflowAddress <0 || _overflowPageCount < np-1) {
00559                         _overflowAddress = sizeof(CbFileHeader)+2*sizeof(size_t)+_pageSize
00560                                         *(CbFileHeader::nPages+CbFileHeader::oPages);                   
00561                         CbFileHeader::oPages += (np-1);
00562                 }
00563                 _overflowPageCount = np-1;
00564                 memcpy(pBuf+ovfloff, &_overflowAddress, sizeof(long));
00565                 memcpy(pBuf+ovfloff+sizeof(long), &_overflowPageCount, sizeof(size_t));
00566                 if (1 != fwrite(pBuf, _pageSize, 1, f) ) {
00567                         return false;
00568                 }
00569                 if (0 != fseek(f, _overflowAddress, SEEK_SET)) {
00570                         return false;
00571                 } else {
00572                         if (1 != fwrite(pBuf+_pageSize, _pageSize*(np-1), 1, f) ) {
00573                                 return false;
00574                         }
00575                 }
00576         }
00577         delete []pBuf;
00578         pBuf = 0;
00579         isDirty = false;
00580         return true;
00581 }
00582 
00583 template<typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType,
00584                 typename Alloc> sdb_node_<KeyType, ValueType,LockType, Alloc>* sdb_node_<
00585                 KeyType, ValueType, LockType, Alloc>::loadChild(size_t childNum, FILE* f) {
00586 
00587         sdb_node_* child;
00588         child = children[childNum];     
00589         if (isLeaf || child == 0) {
00590                 return NULL;
00591                 //assert(0);
00592         }
00593         child->childNo = childNum;
00594         child->parent = this;
00595         if (child && !child->isLoaded) {
00596                 _fileLock.acquire_write_lock();
00597                 child->read(f);
00598                 _fileLock.release_write_lock();
00599         }
00600         
00601         return child;
00602 }
00603 
00604 // Unload a child, which means that we get rid of all
00605 // children in the children vector.
00606 template<typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType,
00607                 typename Alloc> void sdb_node_< KeyType, ValueType, LockType, Alloc>::unload() {
00608         if (isLoaded) {
00609                 if ( !isLeaf) {
00610                         for (size_t i=0; i<objCount+1; i++) {
00611                                 if (children[i]) {                      
00612                                         children[i]->unload();
00613                                         if (children[i])
00614                                                 delete children[i];
00615                                         children[i] = 0;
00616                                 }
00617                         }
00618                 }
00619                 objCount = 0;
00620                 keys.resize(0);
00621                 values.resize(0);
00622                 children.resize(0);
00623                 isLoaded = false;
00624 
00625                 sdb_node_::activeNodeNum--;
00626                 parent = 0;             
00627         }
00628 }
00629 
00630 
00631 template<typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType,
00632                 typename Alloc> void sdb_node_< KeyType, ValueType, LockType, Alloc>::unloadself() {
00633         if (isLoaded) {
00634                 objCount = 0;
00635                 keys.resize(0);
00636                 values.resize(0);
00637                 children.resize(0);
00638                 isLoaded = false;
00639 
00640                 sdb_node_::activeNodeNum--;
00641                 parent = 0;             
00642         }
00643 }
00644 
00645 template<typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType,
00646                 typename Alloc> bool sdb_node_< KeyType, ValueType, LockType, Alloc>::delFromLeaf(
00647                 size_t objNo) {
00648         bool ret = isLeaf;
00649         if (ret) {
00650                 for (size_t i = objNo + 1; i < objCount; i++) {                 
00651                         keys[i-1] = keys[i];
00652                         values[i-1] = values[i];
00653                 }
00654                 setCount(objCount - 1);
00655         }
00656         isDirty = 1;
00657         return ret;
00658 }
00659 
00660 // Find the position of the object in a node. If the key is at pos
00661 // the function returns (pos, ECP_INTHIS). If the key is in a child to
00662 // the left of pos, the function returns (pos, ECP_INLEFT). If the node
00663 // is an internal node, the function returns (objCount, ECP_INRIGHT).
00664 // Otherwise, the function returns ((size_t)-1, false).
00665 // The main assumption here is that we won't be searching for a key
00666 // in this node unless it (a) is not in the tree, or (b) it is in the
00667 // subtree rooted at this node.
00668 
00669 template<typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType,
00670                 typename Alloc> KEYPOS sdb_node_< KeyType, ValueType, LockType, Alloc>::findPos(
00671                 const KeyType& key) {
00672 
00673         KEYPOS ret((size_t)-1, CCP_NONE);
00674         KIT kit = keys.begin();
00675         size_t i = 0;
00676         while (i<objCount && kit < keys.end()) {        
00677                 int compVal = _comp(key, *kit);
00678                 if (compVal == 0) {
00679                         return KEYPOS(i, CCP_INTHIS);
00680                 } else if (compVal < 0) {
00681                         if (isLeaf) {
00682                                 return ret;
00683                         } else {
00684                                 return KEYPOS(i, CCP_INLEFT);
00685                         }
00686                 }
00687                 ++kit, ++i;
00688         }
00689         if (!isLeaf) {
00690                 return KEYPOS(i - 1, CCP_INRIGHT);
00691         }
00692         return ret;
00693 }
